screen - package screen
 
Screen - Class in screen
Abstract superclass of screen-type objects (sometimes called views.) They represent the different views that the game has, such as start screen, game screen and end screen.
Screen() - Constructor for class screen.Screen
 
ScreenManager - Class in screen
The manager class that switches between different screens
